sub_title: Chief Financial Officer at Climate Fund Managers
summary:
A strategic financial and risk management operations officer with extensive experience in private equity fund management. Previous Head of Operations and a member of the executive committee at African Infrastructure Investment Managers (“AIIM”) assisting in development of AIIMs strategic route map. Key skills are policy, operations and corporate services, including financial and working capital management; tax oversight; reporting; governance and compliance. Experience operating at senior management levels and was a director of a general partner of an USD250m African infrastructure fund.
Strong business focus allows me to provide guidance with routine and complex operational and financial issues, addressing challenges and enhancing business performance through initiating and leading delivery of strategic organisation-wide initiatives such as:
1. Structure and establish private equity funds, including USD500m infrastructure fund and USD50m renewable energy fund
2. Establish business entities across Africa in an optimum legal form to meet commercial requirements
3. Implement organisational structure that outlines roles and responsibilities to improve decision making 
4. Design, implement and monitor investment decision making processes to comply with fund agreements
5. Negotiate credit facilities to improve working capital management across Africa
6. Business case design and successful migration of IT platform, resulting in cost savings and improved operational efficiencies and support 
7. Identifying the need for improved fund administration, designed and implemented the sourcing of an administration systems package 
8. Prepared marketing and communications strategy to improve stakeholder communications, including launching website and related marketing materials
Extensive finance management experience gained as OMIGSA's finance manager and project and risk experience as a member of a Finance Control team at Old Mutual's London head office.

school.name: University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika

profile_positions.description:
As the Head of Finance and Structuring I am be responsible for 1.) the finance and accounting functions within Climate Fund Managers and the CFM Managed Entities and 2.) the structuring of transactions, managed vehicles, transactions and organizations forming part of the CFM group and CFM Managed vehicles. Climate Fund Managers currently manages Climate Investor One (USD535m fund size).

As a senior executive in the business, I have joint responsibility with other senior executives for the quality and integrity of CFMs business operations.
profile_positions.title: Head - Structuring and Finance

profile_positions.description: I initially worked with Climate Fund Managers in 2014 and early 2015 on the pre-marketing fund design and establishment. I am now responsible for ensuring the strength and compliance of the operational platform and accountable for finance and stakeholder reporting.
profile_positions.title: Head Of Operations

profile_positions.description:
My experience in private equity fund management has provided me with a good understanding of the fund management operations, thereby enabling me to identify and manage areas that require operational focus, allowing the investment team to have minimum non-investment related distractions.
I have the skills and experience to assist fund managers with the following:
1. Guidance and advice during pre-marketing fund design and establishment, to ensure fund raising commences and closes within targeted timeline.
2. Assistance in developing and implementing a fund raising and closing strategy, including a review of and input into fundraising presentations, private placement memorandums and due diligence packs to ensure timely response to investor due diligence requests and an efficient fund close process.
3. Advice in respect of the preparation of fund documentation and key terms, including input in respect of the accounting, tax, regulatory and operational requirements.
4. Scoping and monitoring operations functions (including defining requirements, sourcing providers and introducing controls to ensure obligations of the fund manager are met).
5. Reviewing and updating of governance structures and decision making processes, to ensure compliance with policies, mandates and regulatory requirements.
profile_positions.title: Private Equity Operations Consultant

company.name: Southern African Venture Capital & Private Equity Association (SAVCA) One-Day Training Programme

profile_positions.company: Southern African Venture Capital & Private Equity Association (SAVCA) One-Day Training Programme
profile_positions.description:
I presented a full-day course to provide an overview of the key considerations in private equity accounting and fund administration. The programme covered the following topics:
• Overview of fund life cycles, structures and key terms
• Key administration and accounting activities at each fund milestone
• Tracking fund income, expenses and tax information to improve reporting
• Compliance with valuation guidelines
• Performance measurement of assets and fund
• Investor reporting
profile_positions.title: Private Equity Fund Accounting and Administration

profile_positions.description:
As the interim COO, I was responsible for Capital Eye Investments' financial, governance and compliance functions in addition to providing support in respect of investor relations and communication within the investment portfolio.  

I was actively involved in CEI’s considerations in respect of their potential evolution  into  the  private  equity fund management space.
profile_positions.title: Interim Chief Operating Officer

profile_positions.description:
As a member of the executive committee provided input to the strategic direction of AIIM. Reporting to the CEO, I was responsible for ensuring the strength and compliance of the operational platform and accountable for legal entity control and oversight of finance, reporting, governance and compliance for the approximately 20 legal entities, including companies, trusts and partnerships across South Africa and extending through Africa. 

Overview of my primary focus: 
a) Managed and contributed to operational processes to initiate and drive solutions that enhance processes and facilitate achievement of business objectives within regulatory requirements
b) Implement and monitor financial and tax controls, review outputs and provide guidance to maintain both audit and tax integrity and high standards of disclosure and reporting 
c) Manage business planning to ensure clear goals are set that align to the business strategy 
d) Manage stakeholder relationships and ensure current and relevant information reported 
e) Design, implement and monitor the risk management and corporate governance framework to ensure compliance with mandate and regulatory requirements and to mitigate market, operational and legal risks 
f) Provide advice regarding operational, accounting, tax and regulatory impacts of entities and fund structures to ensure implementation of effective structures
g) Provide advice and assistance with fund raisings
h) Provide services, advice and assistance to the investment and asset management teams
profile_positions.title: Head of Operations

profile_positions.description:
A business partner on the global Old Mutual Financial Control Initiative ("FCI") Project aimed at reducing financial reporting risk in the group by introducing a common control platform to effectively and consistently execute key finance controls.

A member of the group project board responsible for setting the direction and targets to reach the FCI objectives. Provided support, monitored and coordinated group business units to ensure successful delivery and implementation.
profile_positions.title: Finance Business Partner

profile_positions.description:
Reporting to the head of finance, I was responsible for financial accounting and statutory reporting for over 15 OMIGSA entities, including unit trust manager, 3 unit trust funds, 2 infrastructure fund managers, 3 infrastructure funds, a marketing service company, a focused quantitative investment company, a number of hedge fund companies, 3 staff incentive trusts and an investment holding company. 

I initiated and participated in a number of projects including:
a) Sourced and implemented finance reporting tool to improve reporting capabilities, still in use
b) Finance lead on project to design and implement a fee calculation program
c) Implemented and automated process to improve efficiency of business planning 
d) Implemented and managed a project to consolidate bank accounts leading to cost savings
e) Identifying the need, I arranged the outsourcing of fund administration for 3 unit trust funds and the share schemes to utilise existing group services

My primary focus included: 
a) Responsible for accounting, auditing and tax function to meet group reporting deadlines and ensure audit integrity
b) Calculate, prepare and review statutory and regulatory returns 
c) Responsible for stakeholder reporting 
d) Co-ordinate annual business planning and quarterly reforecasting 
d) Fund administration, investor reporting, cash flows forecasting and fund accounting including managing the capital call and distribution processes for the infrastructure funds
e) Administration of the share schemes including preparing market value reconciliations, maintenance of beneficiary register and monitoring compliance with constituent agreements
profile_positions.title: Finance Manager

a) Full accounting and tax function and reporting for all legal entities (including 30+ properties)
b) Take on of new entities and property funds to ensure accurate accounting and tax treatment
c) Prepare reports for portfolio investment analysts, management, board and shareholders
d) Manage relationship with auditors, banking institutions and insurers
e) Business planning, budgeting including cash forecasting

I initiated a number of projects including:
a) Managed sourcing and implementing accounting and reporting package 
b) Developed cash flow model to forecast future property profit
